body: I have been looking for this for so long, all I need is the English version

This is what the doujin says in a nutshell. (Since Fakku is a bitch) 
-Glasses girl and MC met after some time. 
-MC was framed with panty stealing and his reputation and moral was decimated. 
-Glasses girl proposes to keep meeting. 
-Family shit, he is no longer sad, and his family is reacting positively. 
-MC and glasses girl meet, she tells him that she had to run to meet him and blablabla she skipped student council to meet with him. 
-tits got bigger thanks to his groping. NICE. 
-Blablabla sex talk. 
-MC tells her that she is the only thing he needs to be happy; she enjoyed to hear that. 
-Glasses girl at home admits to be the one who framed him about the panty stealing and she will never let him go or some yandere shit. 

 
No google translation, just poor japanese skills.
Guys the English version is only on fakku (fuck)
Tell me where I can read it's translated verson
Good but there was ching chong madafaker shit so i drop.
@chessers hope you dont mind me asking but does the guy find out she set everything up in the end

Read the translated version on hentainexus a while back (Rip) the boy got accused of stealing some girls panties in his old school and dropped out and becomes something like a neet. The glasses girl helps him get back on his feet and they start dating. We find out at the end she was the one who set him up to make him hated by all the girls so she can have him for herself.
